snippet.title: Untold Tales of Citadale - The Shadow Maker | ANIME jRPG METROIDVANIA Game Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
Untold Tales of Citadale - The Shadow Maker is a unique blend of jRPG and Metroidvania that takes you back to the golden age of pixel-art gaming. Play as Gabriel Dorleac, a seasoned vampire hunter, as he returns to Citadale Castle to face a new threat: The Shadow Maker. But this time, even Gabriel might need help...

Explore a beautifully crafted 2D world filled with vampires, demons, and zombies, and engage in timer-based turn battles that keep you on your toes. With its old-school pixel-art visuals, epic soundtrack, and Metroidvania-inspired exploration, this game is a love letter to classic RPGs with a modern twist.

Key Features:
- Metroidvania-style exploration with interconnected maps
- Timer-based turn battles for fast-paced combat
- Stunning pixel-art visuals that evoke the charm of 1996
- Epic soundtrack that immerses you in the adventure
- A dark, engaging story filled with undead horrors
- Mature themes: Some demons don’t adhere to human standards of decency (contains nudity)

Available now on Steam and itch.io!
👉 [Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2559760/Untold_Tales_of_Citadale_The_Shadow_Maker/]
👉 [itch.io: https://ermedia.itch.io/utoc-shadow]

#UntoldTalesOfCitadale #jRPG #Metroidvania #IndieGame #PixelArt #SteamGames #GameTrailer
